content: row 1 as you work row 1-7 the ws will be facing each other like the inside of a sandwich and the rs of the icing will be on top of the donut while the rs of the bottom of the donut will face down as you work row 8 working through both top and bottom of the donut using your icing colour *single_crochet half_double_crochet 3dc in one single_crochet half_double_crochet single_crochet slip_stitch repeat from * around 42 sts stuff the donut as you go cut yarn and fasten_off weaving in ends colourwork instructions for pink donut work all row in peony pink for chocolate donut work all row in coffee for blueberry donut row 1 3 5 & 7 alternate one single_crochet in cool blue mc and one single_crochet in royal blue cc row 2 4 6 and 8 use only cool blue mc for lemon donut row 1 3 5 & 7 use pale yellow mc and row 2 4 6 & 8 use lemon cc for watermelon donut row 1 3 & 5 1sc in black cc1 2sc in berry mc be sure to work increases properly a second stitch marker may be needed to keep track of increases vs colourwork row 2 4 & 6 just use berry mc for all single_crochet row 7 use lush cc2 and row 8 use kelly cc3 for orange donut the same number of increases are done in each row but they ll be placed in the orange wedges rather than the regular spots like in previous donuts row 1 as for donut bottom and use red heart super saver in pale yellow cc1 row 2 *1sc in cc1 then working with mc 1sc in the next single_crochet 2sc in the next single_crochet repeat from * around 24sc row 3 *1sc in cc1 then working with mc 1sc in the next single_crochet 2sc in the next single_crochet 1sc in the next single_crochet repeat from * around 30sc row 4 *1sc in cc1 then working with mc 1sc in the next 2 single_crochet 2sc in the next single_crochet 1sc in the next single_crochet repeat from * around 36sc row 5 *1sc in cc1 then working with mc 1sc in the next 2 single_crochet 2sc in the next single_crochet 1sc in the next 2 single_crochet repeat from * around 42sc row 6 *1 single_crochet in cc1 then working with mc 1 single_crochet in the next 6 single_crochet repeat from * around 42 single_crochet cut mc and fasten_off row 7 work row in just cc1 then join cc2 row 8 work joining row using just cc2 around you can make different kinds of citrus donuts by substituting different shades of green to make a lime donut or yellow to make a lemon donut © sabrina thompson please don t
